plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location when in use.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location always.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requires access to your location to provide personalized services.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app requires access to your location to provide personalized services.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app requires access to your location to provide personalized services.
